/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of shops and restaurants, their colorful facades adding vibrancy to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the street, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a warm and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
